pli-tv-pvr16:4.2: na kaṇḍusakaraṇamattena → na kaṇḍūsakaraṇamattena (s1-3) | na gaṇḍusakaraṇamattena (mr) | na ovaddheyyakaraṇamattena → na ovaṭṭeyyakaraṇamattena (bj, s1-3) | na ovadeyyakaraṇamattena (mr) | ovaṭṭiyakaraṇamattena → ovattikaraṇa ... (bj); ovaṭṭikaraṇa ... (s1-3)
pli-tv-pvr16:59.1: Tiṇṇaṃ → bhedā tiṇṇaṃ (bj, pts1); bhedato tiṇṇaṃ (mr)
